name: ldjam48-Despair
description:
Despair is a game where the player will make choices in the life of a character who is depressed. The players choices will either bring the player more despair and depression, or hope and happiness.

The player will sink deeper and deeper into despair, until the character ends their life. After learning to navigate the choices correctly, the player will be able to eventually bring hope to the character and win.
